summary: E2E testing of PhotoShare new features: Social Media Sharing, Album Embed, Landing Page Updates, Admin Landing Config. All features verified working.
passed_tests: Landing Page - Admin link is on the LEFT side in navigation
Landing Page - Image carousel visible with prev/next navigation buttons
Landing Page - Brand name centered with tagline 'by Less Real Moments'
Social Share Panel - Floating share button appears on right side of public gallery
Social Share Panel - Clicking toggle expands panel
Social Share Panel - Facebook share button present
Social Share Panel - Twitter/X share button present
Social Share Panel - WhatsApp share button present
Social Share Panel - Copy Link button present
Social Share Panel - 'Shared links are view-only' message displayed
View-Only Mode (?view=1) - 'Upload Your Photos' section is hidden
View-Only Mode - Gallery photos still displayed (2 photos visible)
Embed Code Feature - Embed button found on gallery detail page
Embed Code Feature - Modal opens with 'Embed Gallery' title
Embed Code Feature - Size options: small, medium, large, responsive all present
Embed Code Feature - Preview section showing 'Gallery Preview'
Embed Code Feature - Embed code textarea with iframe code (includes ?view=1&embed=1)
Embed Code Feature - Copy button functional
Embed Code Feature - 'How to use' instructions section visible
Admin Landing Config - Brand Name field exists
Admin Landing Config - Brand Tagline field exists with label '(shown below brand name)'
Admin Landing Config - Hero Title field exists
Admin Landing Config - Hero Subtitle field exists
Admin Landing Config - 10 hero image upload slots in grid (5 columns x 2 rows)
Admin Landing Config - Label says 'Hero Images (Carousel - up to 10 images)'
Admin Landing Config - Save Changes button present
Backend API - Public gallery endpoint works
Backend API - Public gallery photos endpoint works
Backend API - Public landing config returns all 10 hero_image fields
Backend API - Public landing config returns brand_tagline field
Backend API - Admin login works
Backend API - Admin can update landing config
Backend API - Photographer login works
Backend API - Gallery has share_link for embed generation

features_verified: Floating share button on right side (x=1860)
Facebook, Twitter/X, WhatsApp, Copy Link all present
Modal with size options (small, medium, large, responsive)

critical_code_review_comments: SocialSharePanel.jsx properly implements view-only URL with ?view=1 parameter
EmbedCodeModal.jsx correctly generates iframe with view=1&embed=1 parameters
LandingPage.jsx properly handles carousel with up to 10 images
AdminDashboard.jsx has all 10 hero_image input slots
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 5 new features tested and verified working: (1) Social Media Sharing panel on public galleries with Facebook, Twitter/X, WhatsApp, Copy Link options, (2) View-only mode at ?view=1 hides upload section, (3) Embed code modal for photographers with size options and copy functionality, (4) Landing page has Admin link on left, centered brand name with tagline, image carousel, (5) Admin Landing Config has Brand Tagline field and 10 hero image upload slots.
